body.name: Goodyear Eagle LS-2 All Season 235/45R18 94V Passenger Tire
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 30 mins
features: A quality performance tire for a smooth, quiet ride and confident cornering in any season
The tire is outfitted with wide circumferential grooves to help effectively and efficiently evacuate water from beneath the tread for superior wet traction
A special tread block sequence helps to enhance handling and traction while also reducing road noise produced
Premium sidewall styling offers a contemporary appearance
body.description: Goodyear Eagle LS-2 tires are all-season and designed to provide a smooth and quiet ride with reduced tread noise. The Eagle LS-2 is designed for traction with wide circumferential grooves to expel water from the tread and keep grip steady on the road. It also features a computer designed tread block sequence which increases your handling pleasure along with traction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Goodyear Tires: Made for your Roads Ever since the turn of the last century, the name “Goodyear” has been synonymous with automotive tires. From their start with carriage and bicycle tires, rubber horseshoe pads, and poker chips, Goodyear has been first-to-market with dozens of product innovations, starting with Henry Ford’s first-ever racing tire in 1901, the first-ever nylon-reinforced tire in the 1940s, the first-ever American-made radial tire in the 1970s, and on and on to the present day. The Goodyear Blimp is a familiar sight for millions of people, an iconic advertising device that also provides great aerial views of football games and events. Whether you’re looking for passenger, light truck, commercial, agricultural, industrial, or racing tires, Goodyear’s reputation for quality and performance makes them the perfect choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good tires. Very little noise. we'll see about the mileage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tire, great price.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for a 2012 VW Passat. Tires currently have 16k miles on them and still have plenty of life left. They have been great tires so far. We don't get a ton of snow in Kansas City but what little we did, the tires did great. I feel confident driving in the rain as well. They aren't super quiet, but also aren't really noisy. For the $85/each we paid, I am very happy. I would buy again.Edit: 10/3/18-The tires now have just over 49k miles on them. Fronts are at 4.5/32 and rears at 4/32. We've been very happy with these tires. If the price hadn't increased so much since we last bought them (about $40 each!), I would consider them again. One thing I really liked about these tires is the rim protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tire but Amazon sucks on searches
reviews.reviewText: The tires came quickly, great pricing. But the size was off. I proceeded as a test to do another search and I now see that Amazon search system fails to appreciate that a customer TIRE sizing search results CAN NOT show any similar tire size. I will admit I made a mistake. But Amazon still failed me. Car part search results need to be specific. Protect your buyers to a degree as well. As of error I will never buy tires from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I liked the way they performed and noticed they are very ...
reviews.reviewText: Well I'll say this. My car was purchased with all around LS-2 tires already on it. I liked the way they performed and noticed they are very reasonably priced so I decided to buy two this past February to replace my front tires. Now my rear tires are in dire need of replacement as well (They are smooth from wear), however for some reason now Amazon is unable to ship two more to my address when previously this wasn't a problem. My review score doesn't reflect my dissatisfaction with being unable to order two more again for this shipping issue, though I thought I'd bring it to the sellers attention in the event they actually review this review. Great tires! Let me buy two more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightning fast delivery!!
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t had the tires mounted on my car yet but seeing as this is the same tires already on my car and Ive been extremely impressed with them, I’m sure they’ll be fine. What I really wanna brag on is the shipping of these bad boys!! I literally received shipping info within 24 hours of purchasing and received my tires 3 days before the expected delivery date!!
